header_text: You arrive at a luncheon in a new outfit. Everyone turns to look at you as you walk in. You decide that they must think you look stylish.

elements.Text: Did everyone at the luncheon like your new outfit?

elements.name: You arrive at a luncheon in a new outfit. Everyone turns to look at you as you walk in. You decide that they must think you look stylish._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
